data.description:
With the Full Release Update 1.5, our Drone Simulator VR takes off, leaving Early Access behind – ready to explore the horizon!

Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced pilot, Drone Simulator VR offers the amazing opportunity to gain your first flying experience or refine your skills. With three customizable control modes and the flight modes Tripod, Position, and Sport, you can get the most out of your drone.

Enhance your maneuvering skills on the training map or explore new, diverse maps filled with exciting challenges. Practice using the drone camera at numerous photospots and capture the perfect shot with zoom and gimbal settings or discover hidden collectibles to unlock new colors for your drone.

Put your skills to the test in thrilling time trials and prove you’re fast enough to earn a gold medal on every track!

In the simulator, you can push your limits without fear – after every crash, the drone hangar instantly provides you with a new drone. This way, you can perfect your flying skills without the worry of damaging your drone.

changelog.change_log:
Important Hotfix Update:

Fixed a game-breaking bug in Industrial Area Map .
Zoom level now allows the completion of photospot (graffiti) again.

DRONE:

• Drone physics reworked: Experience more realistic and responsive flight behavior.
• Control modes: Choose between three different modes to suit your flying style.
• Speed modes: Available speed modes are "T" (Tripod), "P" (Positioning), and "S" (Sport).
• Idle hover animation: New hover animation when the drone is idling.
• Indicator lights: Added indicator lights to show the drone's orientation and improve visibility.

MAPS:

• New map – Industrial Area: Explore a brand new map set in an industrial environment.
• New map – Castle Ruin: Navigate through medieval castle ruins located in a natural, scenic environment.
• Reworked standard map: Enhancements and updates made to the existing map.

CHALLENGES:

• Photospots: Complete photo challenges to unlock new maps.
• Collectables: Gather hidden items to unlock new drone colors.
• New races: Additional time trials with medals to unlock.

USER AREA:

• Progress Overview Board: Track your progress on a new overview board.
• Meta-avatar: Use your Meta-avatar as your in-game character.
• Large map display: A big map for better navigation and planning.
• Updated Control Panel: Improved user interface for easier control.

PERFORMANCE AND QUALITY:

• Higher render resolution: Improved graphics resolution across all devices.
• Optimized for Quest 2: Device-specific optimizations for better performance.
• Reduced loading times: Experience faster loading times for smoother gameplay.
• Sharper textures: Improved texture quality for greater clarity.

AUDIO:

• Ambience audio for each map: Each map now features unique atmospheric sound effects.
• Improved sound design: Updated audio feedback for a more immersive experience.
• Reworked drone SFX: Drone sound effects dynamically respond better to different flight movements.
